messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unicorns...
messages.msgSnippet: Kelly~I agree with you...I thought that was very funny! I laughed so loud my children wanted to know what I was laughing about. They thought it was funny
messages.messageBody:
Kelly~I agree with you...I thought that was very funny! I laughed so loud my children wanted to know what I was laughing about. They thought it was funny too!~Annie~~You may laugh at me because I am different. I laugh at you because you are all the same.~~--- On Tue 04/15, < kbcdlovejo@... > wrote:From: [mailto: kbcdlovejo@...]To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.comDate: Tue, 15 Apr 2003 18:47:43 EDTSubject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the evil Shel SilversteinIn a message dated 4/15/2003 3:54:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time, nellebelle@... writes:> I was at Costco last October when a young boy asked his mom to buy him a> unicorn costume. She said no, because only girls are unicorns. I said> maybe that is why the unicorns died out, because they were all female. She> wasn't amused.*I* WAS! ~Kelly[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
